# Build better searches for systematic literature review

## This search engine look for variations:

-   American vs British English

-   Plural forms and nouns

-   Verb tense changes

# Search operators (Boolean)

-   AND / OR

## Search symbols 

-   \* Any numbers or characters

    -   investment -> invest\* = investors, investment, invested, investing...

-   " " Exact phrases
    - "foreign investment"
    - "greenfield investment"
